channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Khoury College of Computer Sciences, Northeastern University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Private Geometric Median
item.description: This paper introduces new differentially private algorithms to compute the geometric median, achieving improved accuracy by scaling with the effective data diameter instead of a known radius.
